title: Local Grocery E-Commerce Platform
description: Developed a full-featured e-commerce solution specifically for local grocery stores with comprehensive inventory management. This platform was designed to help small businesses transition to online operations with secure payment processing and user data protection.

title: Secure User Authentication System
description: Built a robust authentication system implementing modern security best practices. This project was focused on understanding and mitigating common authentication vulnerabilities while providing a seamless user experience.

title: Cyber Threat Analysis
description: Created a responsive web application for analyzing potential cyber threats from URLs. This tool integrates with threat intelligence APIs to provide real-time scanning and threat detection capabilities with a focus on secure data handling.
